entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 3:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
